training.title: Training center

training.proOnly: Full guided training is a PRO feature.

teaser.defenseDescription: You've been taking too much Hog Rider damage. Practice Cannon 4-3 placement.
teaser.spellsDescription: Your Zaps are late against Goblin Barrel. Improve your reaction timing.
teaser.elixirDescription: Avoid leaking elixir at the start of the match. Keep a steady flow.

training.advancedUnlockedDescription: Access specific scenarios, matchups, and deeper analysis to improve faster.
training.advancedLockedDescription: PRO subscribers get access to matchup scenarios and frame-by-frame replay analysis.
training.finishAllDrillsHint: Complete all drills to finish the plan.

training.emptyStateDescription: Start by generating an analysis, then build your custom drill plan.
training.analysisRequiredHint: You need a push analysis before generating a plan.
training.pushAnalysisDescription: Generate an analysis to feed your next training plan.
training.executionTip1: Run drills in short 3–5 match blocks to reduce variance.
training.executionTip2: If high tilt appears, pause after 2 consecutive losses.

toast.planCompletedDescription: Great job! Your plan is complete.
